item.description:
Hi guys - Bison County is one of my favorite places on Moody Street. The food is really good and they have a pretty decent beer selection. It's down on Moody and officially part of our stomping grounds, so let's give it a looksy.

This is kind of ghetto, but if you check your ValPak, you'll get a $5 off $20 coupon for food - score! I'll be bringing mine for the group to enjoy.

Note: If you haven't already, please bring a donation of $5 each to help cover the costs of running the group. I appreciate your help in keeping us going.
item.name: Mosey on down to Bison County
